verbose_text: The PAP1 / myb75 transcription factor gene from Arabidopsis was expressed in tobacco cell cultures and resulted in dark red cells, and the maize Lc gene expressed in apple resulted in high anthocyanin accumulation in transgenic plants, showing the feasibility of obtaining plants transformed with these transcription factor genes.
evidence: PAP1/myb75 transcription factor gene from Arabidopsis was expressed
